Description: Pendant: the pendant is disc-shaped, made of opaque white glass. Around the thickness of the disc has been trailed a thread of opaque bright-blue glass so that a blue and white stripe effect has been created. At the top is a suspension loop of bright-blue glass.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Sale Catalogue, Henry Salt Collection, Sotheby, London, 28 June – 8 July 1835, lot 618.
